TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit MachineKey extends System.Object
public ref class MachineKey abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一种使用与 ASP.NET 窗体身份验证和视图状态所用相同的算法和密钥值对数据进行加密或哈希处理（或两者）的方法。

span.span: Provides a way to encrypt or hash data (or both) by using the same algorithms and key values that are used for ASP.NET forms authentication and view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供公开 ASP.NET 提供的哈希和加密逻辑的方法。The class provides methods that expose the hashing and encryption logic that ASP.NET provides. 有关 ASP.NET 使用的加密和哈希算法及其使用的密钥值的信息，请参阅 [MachineKey 元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/w8h3skw9(v=vs.100))。For information about which encryption and hashing algorithms ASP.NET uses, and the key values that it uses with them, see [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/w8h3skw9(v=vs.100)). > [!WARNING] > Api 只应在 ASP.NET 应用程序中使用。The APIs should only be used in an ASP.NET app. 未定义 ASP.NET 应用程序上下文外部的 MachineKey Api 的行为Behavior of the MachineKey APIs outside the context of an ASP.NET application is undefined

exception.span: 要加密、哈希、或验证的数据不存在

span.span: The data to encrypt, hash, decrypt, or validate does not exist

MemberSignature.Value: public static byte[] Decode (string encodedData, System.Web.Security.MachineKeyProtection protectionOption);
.method public static hidebysig unsigned int8[] Decode(string encodedData, valuetype System.Web.Security.MachineKeyProtection protectionOption) cil managed
Public Shared Function Decode (encodedData As String, protectionOption As MachineKeyProtection) As Byte()
public: static cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Decode(System::String ^ encodedData, System::Web::Security::MachineKeyProtection protectionOption);
static member Decode : string * System.Web.Security.MachineKeyProtection -> byte[]

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This method is obsolete and is only provided for compatibility with existing code. It is recommended that new code use the Protect and Unprotect methods instead.")]
[<System.Obsolete("This method is obsolete and is only provided for compatibility with existing code. It is recommended that new code use the Protect and Unprotect methods instead.")>]

param.name: encodedData
param.span: 要解密和/或验证的加密数据。

span.span: The encrypted data to decrypt and/or validate.

param.name: protectionOption
param.span: 指示 参数是否应该加密和/或进行哈希运算。

span.span: Indicates whether the parameter should be encrypted and/or hashed.

summary.span: 已加密或提供基于哈希消息的验证代码 (HMAC) 的解码和/或验证数据。

span.span: Decodes and/or validates data that has been encrypted or provided with a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC).

returns.span: 数组，它表示已解密的数据。

span.span: A array that represents the decrypted data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 ASP.NET 用于解密和验证传入数据的加密和哈希算法的信息，请参阅 [MachineKey 元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/w8h3skw9(v=vs.100))。For information about which encryption and hashing algorithms ASP.NET uses to decrypt and validate the data that is passed in, see [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/w8h3skw9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅 类概述。For a code example, see the class overview.

static member Encode : byte[] * System.Web.Security.MachineKeyProtection -> string

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This method is obsolete and is only provided for compatibility with existing code. It is recommended that new code use the Protect and Unprotect methods instead.")]
[<System.Obsolete("This method is obsolete and is only provided for compatibility with existing code. It is recommended that new code use the Protect and Unprotect methods instead.")>]

span.span: The data to encrypt.

param.name: protectionOption
param.span: 指示 参数是否应该加密和/或进行哈希运算。

span.span: Indicates whether the parameter should be encrypted and/or hashed.

summary.span: 加密数据和/或追加基于哈希的消息验证代码 (HMAC)。

span.span: Encrypts data and/or appends a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC).

returns.span: 加密后的值，也就是追加了 HMAC 的输入值，或者是加密追加了 HMAC 的输入值的结果。

span.span: The encrypted value, the input value with an HMAC appended, or the result of encrypting the input value with an HMAC appended.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 ASP.NET 用于解密和验证传入数据的加密和哈希算法的信息，请参阅 [MachineKey 元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/w8h3skw9(v=vs.100))。For information about which encryption and hashing algorithms ASP.NET uses to decrypt and validate the data that is passed in, see [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/w8h3skw9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅 类概述。For a code example, see the class overview.

MemberSignature.Value: public static byte[] Protect (byte[] userData, params string[] purposes);
.method public static hidebysig unsigned int8[] Protect(unsigned int8[] userData, string[] purposes) cil managed
Public Shared Function Protect (userData As Byte(), ParamArray purposes As String()) As Byte()
public: static cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Protect(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ userData, ... cli::array <System::String ^> ^ purposes);
static member Protect : byte[] * string[] -> byte[]

span.span: The data to protect.
This data is passed as plaintext.

param.name: purposes

span.span: A list of purposes for the data.

param.span: 如果此值指定，同一列表必须传递到 方法来解密返回的密码文本。

span.span: If this value is specified, the same list must be passed to the method in order to decipher the returned ciphertext.

summary.span: 通过加密或签名保护指定的数据。

span.span: Protects the specified data by encrypting or signing it.
The ciphertext data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法取代了 方法，该方法要求调用方指定是否应对纯文本数据进行加密和/或签名。This method supersedes the method, which requires the caller to specify whether the plaintext data should be encrypted, signed, or both. 方法执行相应的操作并安全地保护数据。The method performs the appropriate operation and securely protects the data. 此方法生成的密码文本数据只能由 方法破译。Ciphertext data produced by this method can only be deciphered by the method. `purposes`参数是可将密码文本锁定为特定用途的原因的可选列表。The `purposes` parameter is an optional list of reasons that can lock the ciphertext to a specific purpose. 此参数可用于隔离应用程序中的不同子系统执行的加密操作。This parameter lets you isolate cryptographic operations performed by different subsystems within an application. 恶意客户端应无法获得一个子系统的方法的结果，并将 其作为输入源到另一个子系统的 方法，这可能会破坏应用程序的安全性。A malicious client should not be able to get the result of one subsystem's method and feed it as input to another subsystem's method, which could compromise application security. `purposes`参数可帮助确保受保护的数据只能由最初生成它的组件使用。The `purposes` parameter helps ensure that protected data can only be used by the component that originally generated it. 应用程序应确保每个子系统使用唯一的 `purposes` 列表。Applications should make sure that each subsystem uses a unique `purposes` list. 例如，若要保护或取消保护身份验证令牌，可以使用类似于以下示例的代码调用该方法：For example, to protect or unprotect an authentication token, you could call the method using code like the following example: ```csharp MachineKey.Protect(..., "Authentication token"); MachineKey.Unprotect(..., "Authentication token"); ``` ```vb MachineKey.Protect(..., "Authentication token") MachineKey.Unprotect(..., "Authentication token") ``` 应用程序可以动态生成 `purposes` 参数。Applications can dynamically generate the `purposes` parameter. 在这种情况下，使用固定值为用户提供的值加上前缀 (如 " `Username:` " + *Username*) ，以最大程度地降低恶意客户端的风险。In that case, prefix user-supplied values with a fixed value (like "`Username:` " + *username*) to minimize the risk of a malicious client crafting input that matches a token that is used by some other part of the system. 所有动态生成的字符串都应出现在固定字符串之后。Any dynamically-generated strings should come after fixed strings. 例如，若要保护或取消保护绑定到特定用户的专用消息，请使用类似于以下示例的代码：For example, to protect or unprotect a private message that is tied to a specific user, use code like the following example: ```csharp MachineKey.Protect(..., "Private message", "Recipient: " + username); MachineKey.Unprotect(..., "Private message", "Recipient: " + username); ``` ```vb MachineKey.Protect(..., "Private message", "Recipient: " + username) MachineKey.Unprotect(..., "Private message", "Recipient: " + username) ``` 调用方法时，为参数提供的值 `purposes` 必须与提供给方法的值相同 。When the method is called, the value that is provided for the `purposes` parameter must be the same value that was provided to the method. 否则，操作将失败，并出现 异常。Otherwise the operation will fail with a exception. 此方法需要选项所需的配置设置， 即使该 属性未设置为选项也是如此 。The configuration settings that are required for the option are required for this method even if the property is not set to the option.

span.span: The parameter is null.

exception.span: 包含一个或多个仅空格条目的目标数组。

span.span: The purposes array contains one or more white-space-only entries.

MemberSignature.Value: public static byte[] Unprotect (byte[] protectedData, params string[] purposes);
.method public static hidebysig unsigned int8[] Unprotect(unsigned int8[] protectedData, string[] purposes) cil managed
Public Shared Function Unprotect (protectedData As Byte(), ParamArray purposes As String()) As Byte()
public: static cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Unprotect(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ protectedData, ... cli::array <System::String ^> ^ purposes);
static member Unprotect : byte[] * string[] -> byte[]

param.name: protectedData
param.span: 不受保护的密码文本数据。

span.span: The ciphertext data to unprotect.

param.name: purposes
param.span: 描述数据用途的目标列表。

span.span: A list of purposes that describe what the data is meant for.

param.span: 当数据受到保护时，这必须与传递给 方法的值相同。

span.span: This must be the same value that was passed to the method when the data was protected.

summary.span: 取消由 方法保护指定的数据。

span.span: Unprotects the specified data, which was protected by the method.
The plaintext data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关此方法的信息，请参见 方法。For information about this method, see the method.

span.span: The parameter is null.

exception.span: 包含一个或多个仅空格条目的目标数组。

span.span: The purposes array contains one or more white-space-only entries.
Possible causes include the following:
- The protected data was tampered with.

exception.span: - 参数的值与数据受保护时指定的值不同。

span.span: - The value of the parameter is not the same as the value that was specified when the data was protected.

exception.span: - 应用程序在多台服务器上进行部署并且使用的是自动生成的加密密钥。

span.span: - The application is deployed to more than one server and is using auto-generated encryption keys.
